title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content:
and then nothing. You will then have to choose among three responses:

Now what? Do you have any idea where we are? What happened to our gith friend?

If you choose the second option, she'll say that she doesn't recognize the place. She'll then go on to say that you first need to find supplies, shelter, and most important of all, a healer, for the monsters living inside your head. This will prompt 3 more dialogue options:

'We'? You want to stay together? What happened to our gith friend? Indee
